title: A Collection of Short Danmei Stories - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Tragedy   Yaoi
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Bickering Couple   Broken Engagement   Brother Complex   Childhood Promise   Collection of Short Stories   Enemies Become Lovers   First Love   Incest   Marriage   Mpreg   Short Story   Siblings
author: 明清时节
description:
What is love?

Love is a wound that is unable to be exposed merely from pictures;

Love is a sorrow that is unable to be expressed solely by words;

But love consists of more than just pain and despair,

Love can be exhilarating, it can also be blissful.

Even if it’s ambiguous, it can still be mutually protected for life.

In this novel, there are many stories; some maybe vague, others perhaps clear.>
